##학점그래프(가상)
```{r, echo=TRUE}
install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
grade<-data.frame(
  grade=c(1,2,3,4),
  credit=c(4.5,4,3.5,3)
)
ggplot(data=grade)+geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=grade,y=credit))
```
